reviewText: These are the kind of Classic spaggitte western make you laugh what used to the be in the Earlier years very good dry humour with a twist on the ending.
Avoid - awful picture and sound quality. That's it. Even if the story is ok, You can't stand so lousy quality. It is like I have my old VHS copied in basement. Simply terrible.

The GUNSLINGERS 4 Movie Pack consists entirely of public domain spaghetti westerns. CONTENTS: BEYOND THE LAW-- The company payroll a Czech mining engineer was to deliver to workers is stolen and he asks the local marshal's help in getting it back, not knowing the man is a member of the gang who robbed him. BOOT HILL-- (aka "Trinity Rides Again") A lesser entry in the series of "Trinity" western comedies. A man shot by bandits recovers with the aid of a circus troupe. When one of his new friends is killed, the man seeks revenge. DEATH RIDES A HORSE-- A man is intent on avenging the murder of his family, an act he witnessed as a boy, 15 years earlier. Spaghetti western that's the highlight of this collection. GOD'S GUN-- A strong cast, filmed in Israel by an Italian company. Van Cleef in a dual role here: he portrays a priest who is murdered and the twin brother out for vengeance. Richard Boone is amusing as an over-the-top drunken sheriff, and Jack Palance is appropriately sinister. Watch for Palance's son Cody as a gang member named Zeke. For more wild western action check out LEGENDS OF THE WEST 4 Movie Pack, also from BCI / Eclipse. BRENTWOOD's 4-fers are nicely priced movie bundles. Video and sound quality of these digitally unrestored public domain films is generally fine. Discs are dual-side recorded. . Parenthetical numbers preceding titles are 1 to 10 viewer poll ratings found at a film resource website. (5.8) Beyond the Law (Italy/W Ger/Monaco-1968) - Lee Van Cleef/Anthony Sabato/Gordon Mitchell/Lionel Stander/Bud Spencer (5.1) Boot Hill (Italy-1969) - Terence Hill/Woody Strode/Bud Spencer/Victor Buono/Lionel Stander (6.9) Death Rides a Horse (Italy-1967) - Lee Van Cleef/John Phillip Law/Mario Brega/Anthony Dawson (4.0) God's Gun (Italy/Israel-1976) - Lee Van Cleef/Jack Palance/Richard Boone/Sybil Danning/Leif Garrett/Robert Lipton/Cody Palance
Look like tape-ripped and the dvd don't have atractive features like niced-menu, subtitles or languajes options. The dvd media is genuine, but poor technical work.
these 4 movies are on the 10 pack collections bcieclipse offers ,but if you can't aford the $20.00 you can get these 4 packs which are very nice and are very well priced.

Excellent; Lee Van Cleef was great to watch (as always).  If you haven't seen these great westerns I recommend u do so.  If you're like me, you buy it for the fact that it's a collector's item and speaks for itself.  Enjoy
